synopsis.text: Now a towering figure with an eye-catching physique, middle school student Fuuka Saitou finds herself navigating the complexities of adolescence and unrequited love for her older brother, Hikaru. Known as 'Saipu' by her classmates due to her unique hairstyle that reveals only one eye, Fuuka's childhood promise to marry her brother has evolved into a relentless pursuit, causing awkward situations and misunderstandings both at home and school. As Fuuka's feelings intensify, Hikaru struggles to maintain a comfortable distance from his sister while she attempts to persuade him to fulfill her romantic desires. Will Hikaru be able to endure these uncomfortable circumstances until Fuuka moves on to high school, or will he succumb to his sister's persistent advances?
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
